item.title: MongoDB for Developer M101P notes
item.description: insertMany(), default ordered: true, once it encounters as error, insert stop. If ordered set to false, it will insert the rest of documents despite any errors. ObjectId: 12-Byte Hex string _ _ _ _ , _ _ _ , _ _ , _ _ _ Date (time stamp), Mac addr, PID (process ID), Counter Exact match on array field example: db.movieDetails.find({“writers”: [“A”, “B”]}).count(), ordering matters. To find a match within array: db.
